title: Ron Klain: "The calendar only has so many months left in this year"
description: White House Chief of Staff Ron Klain talks about U.S. support for  Ukraine in its fight against Russia, telling Chuck Todd that “Evil exists. But we certainly can punish it. And we certainly can help those who are fighting back against it do that.” Klain also discussed immigration, the Biden agenda, how the White House views Vladimir Putin and reports of a rift with House Speaker Nancy Pelosi.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
